General.Name: Mold-Tek Packaging Limited
General.Description: Mold-Tek Packaging Limited manufactures and sells plastic packaging containers in India. It offers sanitizer and food containers, dispensing pumps, lubricant packs, and paint and bulk packaging products. The company was formerly known as Moldtek Plastics Limited and changed its name to Mold-Tek Packaging Limited in March 2010. Mold-Tek Packaging Limited was founded in 1986 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
